meanings.definition: To contain within as a part of a whole.
meanings.sent1: The picnic basket will include sandwiches and fruits.
meanings.sent2: Please include your contact information on the form.
meanings.sent3: I hope the surprise gift will include a funny joke.
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to include a touch of mischief.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest will include gold coins and precious gems.

meanings.definition: To consider as part of something.
meanings.sent1: When planning the trip, we must include the cost of accommodation.
meanings.sent2: Don't forget to include your sister in the birthday celebration.
meanings.sent3: I always include my dog in family photos for fun.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to work seemed to include a sense of pride.
meanings.sent5: The recipe should include a pinch of salt for flavor.

meanings.definition: To make part of a category or group.
meanings.sent1: The new book will include various genres like mystery and romance.
meanings.sent2: Let's include everyone in the discussion to gather diverse opinions.
meanings.sent3: The costume party will include superheroes and villains.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness seemed to include everyone in her circle of friends.
meanings.sent5: The art exhibition will include paintings and sculptures.
